mapper.select: SELECT j.id as jobId, j.job_desc as jobDesc, j.status as status, j.interviewer_id as interviewerId, j.prompt as prompt, i.ai_name as interviewerName, j.create_time as createTime, FROM job j left join interviewer i on j.interviewer_id = i.id order by j.updated_time desc
SELECT id as jobId, job_name as jobName FROM job where status = 1
